sentences.en: But let's not overestimate them, for they are only a beginning.
sentences.cn: 但是不要估计太高, 现在还刚刚开始.

sentences.en: Don't overestimate seriousness of the problem.
He just knows how to glorify himself, do not overestimate him.
sentences.cn: 他这人只会自我吹捧, 你可别高看了他.

sentences.en: He tends to overestimate his own abilities.
sentences.cn: 他往往高估自己的能力。

sentences.en: I think you overestimate me, Fred.
sentences.cn: 我认为你高估我了，弗雷德。

sentences.en: It is hard to overestimate the potential gains from this process.
sentences.cn: 这一工艺的潜在收益不可估量。

sentences.en: It is impossible to overestimate the value of the invention.
sentences.cn: 这项发明的价值无论怎样估计也不会太高.

sentences.en: It may overestimate body fat in athletes and others a muscular build.
sentences.cn: 可能高估了运动员和肌肉发达者的身体脂肪.

sentences.en: It's difficult to overestimate the role of laughter.
sentences.cn: 人们怎么评价笑的作用都不为过.

sentences.en: Leo Rising tends to overestimate themselves a bit.
sentences.cn: 上升狮子座喜欢有点高估自己.

sentences.en: Nor should they overestimate their joint capacity in shaping the world order.
sentences.cn: 它们也不应该高估自己合作打造世界秩序的能力.

sentences.en: Overconfidence : Don't overestimate yourself or you may get hurt. Decide carefully.
sentences.cn: 自 负: 别太高估自己,不然你会受到伤害. 小心的做决定吧.

sentences.en: People overestimate the cost of an endeavor like this.
sentences.cn: 人们往往会高估实现这类梦想的成本.

sentences.en: The importance of such gestures is hard to overestimate.
sentences.cn: 这些表态的重要性可不容小觑.

sentences.en: The importance of training in health and safety cannot be overestimated (= is extremely important ).
sentences.cn: 对健康和安全方面的培训极为重要。

sentences.en: They invariably overestimate their own strength and underestimate ours.
sentences.cn: 他们总是高估了自己的力量,低估了我们的力量.

sentences.en: We can not overestimate the value of modern sculpture too much.
sentences.cn: 我们对现代雕塑价值的估计,再高也不算过分.

words.tran_cn: 过高的估计,过高的评价

trans.tran_cn: 过高的估计，过分的评价
trans.tran_en: a calculation, judgement, or guess that is too large

trans.tran_cn: 对……评价过高；对……估计过高
trans.tran_en: to think something is better, more important etc than it really is

trans.tran_cn: 对…作过高的评价，对…估计过高
trans.tran_en: to think something is better, more important etc than it really is
to think something is better, more important etc than it really is
